inventory=[{"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "dirt", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "light_blue_wool", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 18, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a soul_torch, I need to first craft a torch. To craft a torch, I need to smelt a coal_ore into a coal. I will smelt the coal_ore in slot 36 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 36 to slot 11 with quantity 1
